channel.title: SyncMonk SyncESMC on SyncE Projects
channel.description: Recent content in SyncMonk SyncESMC on SyncE Projects

item.title: Documentation
item.description: Documentation Table of Contents Overview Synchronization Network Topology Why SyncESMC Architecture Design Goals Configuration Packet Engine ESMC State Machine External MUX for Input Signals Hardware Abstraction Layer External Interface Overview ESMC is a Logical Channel which transmits SSM information. The SSM information determines the Quality level of EEC. It is based on ITU-T G.8264 (03/2018) and ITU-T G.781 (04/2020) Ethernet SSM is ITU-T-defined Ethernet Slow Protocol.
